catalog_script_client.name: Prevent booking of < 1 hours

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_0b138ca047b311109a45dac8536d430c
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Small Room (1-2 persons)">08ab8bcb472711109a45dac8536d43db</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Prevent booking of < 1 hours</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onSubmit() {
   var start = g_form.getValue('start_time');
    var end = g_form.getValue('end_time');
	
	var duration = end - start;
	
	if (duration < 1){
		alert('You must book at least 1 hour');
		return false;
	}
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>kim.lindgren</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-12-12 15:22:03</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>0b138ca047b311109a45dac8536d430c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Prevent booking of < 1 hours</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Work Hub " source="x_950986_work_hub">4dc0b4a2472711109a45dac8536d4328</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Work Hub ">4dc0b4a2472711109a45dac8536d4328</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_0b138ca047b311109a45dac8536d430c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>kim.lindgren</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-12-12 15:23:03</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onSubmit</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
